cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Security Advisory: mailman security update
cvrfdoc.document_distribution: Copyright Â© 2021 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
Please note that this update is available via Red Hat Network.  To use Red
Hat Network, launch the Red Hat Update Agent with the following command:
up2date
This will start an interactive process that will result in the appropriate
RPMs being upgraded on your system.

note:
Updated mailman packages are now available for Red Hat Linux Advanced Server. 
These updates resolve a cross-site scripting vulnerability present in
versions of Mailman prior to 2.0.11.

Two cross-site scripting vulnerabilities have been discovered in versions
of Mailman prior to version 2.0.11.
